transArray.content: The hotel was booked for my wife. The feedback on the check-in experience was very good. The service was very enthusiastic. The snacks and fruits prepared were abundant. It was worthy of the price.

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital, the subway and the bus station, and the hotel provides electronic parking tickets for free parking. Travel routes can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is fully equipped with electric curtains, refrigerated refrigerators, and snacks and fresh oranges are provided at the front desk. I hope it can bring you good memories. Sincerely Looking forward to your next visit! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
